reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: In view of effective and efficient programme implementation, staff well-being and safety in Liberia, investments in programme and project support are necessary. The Country Office fulfils an essential function in supporting the local partners in project p lanning and implementation, expanding and diversifying the funding base, increasing FCA and its donors’ visibility and possibility to contribute to national and international development advocacy and discourse. The overall objective of the project is: T he overall objective is to improve effectiveness, quality and impact of the Liberia country programme focusing on the thematic areas, Right to Livelihoods, Right to Peace and Right to Education through established field presence.Specific objective is: “E ffective and quality programming is ensured through appropriate resourcing, systems, procedures and thematic and other expertise in Liberia Country Office.” Activities: • Strategic and operational planning in Liberia• Programme and project PME and ad ministrative support• Planning, Monitoring of Sierra Leone country programme and projects• Provision of thematic advice to Liberia country projects• Building the institutional capacity of local partners• Networking with other aid organizations at r egional and local level and cooperation with all the stakeholders• Broadening access to new funding opportunities and diversifying the funding base• Coordination of work and cooperation with other NGOs• Ensuring increased input of partner organizatio ns and topics from Liberia into the lobby and advocacy work• Further strengthening of the management and administration of the Liberia Country Office • Resourcing and staffing of the Country OfficeRight- holders /beneficiaries: Local and regional civil society actors.Implementing partner:No specific implementing partner. Some legal and other services could be sought from local service providers or consultants.
